snippet.title: CS2D Trailer 2017
snippet.description:
CS2D - Free Top-Down Multiplayer Shooter

More than just Counter-Srike in 2D! Accomplish new missions like capture the flag or domination! Use a huge arsenal of weapons and equipment including crazy stuff like portal guns, lasers, RPGs, turrets and much more! You can even build stuff!

CS2D runs on Windows, Linux and MacOS and comes with a headless dedicated server. It's available in a lot of languages.

CS2D is highly customizable and you can script your own mods with Lua.

A built-in and easy to use map editor allows you to create your own maps within seconds!

Get the game now for free
www.CS2D.com

The download is tiny and you can even run it without installing it!


This trailer is using video effects from www.productioncrate.com (Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License) and music from the YouTube audio library.
